author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Simplify studies of isolated charged hadrons in the measurement of calorimeter response in low pileup event sample

#### PR validation:

Tested with cfg files in the area Calibration/IsolatedParticles/test

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-alca162 Simplify the studies of energy response of isolated charged hadrons
